articles.description: Lando Norris' win in Miami was overdue and his talent has been clear for a long time, writes F1 correspondent Andrew Benson.
articles.title: Miami Grand Prix 2024: 'Lando Norris win well deserved as Red Bull turmoil continues'

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Danny Murphy is impressed by Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah in Sunday's win over Tottenham, but says keeping him will not be the club's priority this summer.
articles.title: Danny Murphy column: Keeping Mohamed Salah not Liverpool’s priority

articles.description: Tottenham's dramatic decline in form has come just at the crucial point of the Premier League season, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Tottenham 'dramatic decline' comes at crucial stage of season

articles.description: Bundesliga champions Bayer Leverkusen thrash Eintracht Frankfurt to extend their unbeaten run in all competitions to 48 games.
articles.title: Eintracht Frankfurt 1-5 Bayer Leverkusen: Bundesliga champions thrash Frankfurt to remain unbeaten

articles.description: Miami Grand Prix 2024 results: Lando Norris wins first F1 race from Max Verstappen
articles.title: Miami Grand Prix 2024 results: Lando Norris wins first F1 race from Max Verstappen

articles.description: Harlequins head coach Danny Wilson says the "damage was done" in the first half as his side were beaten 38-26 by Toulouse in their debut Champions Cup semi-final.
articles.title: Toulouse 38-26 Harlequins: Damage done in the first half, says Danny Wilson

articles.description: Joe Root is leading calls from players to reduce the amount of domestic cricket and review a schedule that is “not fit for purpose”.
articles.title: Joe Root leads PCA calls for schedule change in domestic cricket

articles.description: Kyren Wilson sweeps into a 7-1 lead over Jak Jones in the final of the World Championship.
articles.title: World Championship: Wilson dominates opening session of final

articles.description: Manager David Moyes apologises to West Ham fans after watching their side fall to a heavy defeat at Chelsea.
articles.title: Moyes apologises to fans after heavy Chelsea loss

articles.description: Manchester City looked like they had one hand on the WSL trophy until everything changed against Arsenal.
articles.title: Man City defeat by Arsenal 'throws WSL title race up in the air'
